title: Fix Category Circle Styling and Add Footer Social Media & Policy Links

requirements.text: Remove rectangular background shapes from the scrollable product category circles located just below the header on the home page

quotes: on home page just below header, there are produced categorys scrollable circle. Behind that there are rectangular shaped object which needs to be removed

acceptanceCriteria: Category circles appear without any rectangular background containers
Visual styling matches the animated beige body background

requirements.text: Apply glow effect animation to category circles that matches the animated beige body background theme

quotes: match the animated beige body background, and add proper glow effect animation

acceptanceCriteria: Category circles display a subtle glow animation
Glow effect color scheme harmonizes with the beige animated background
Animation loops smoothly without performance issues

requirements.text: Add Instagram, Facebook, and X (Twitter) social media icons to the footer with clickable links that redirect to URLs controlled through the admin panel

quotes: on footer, place social media icons which directs to details in admin control

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays three social media icons (Instagram, Facebook, X)
Each icon links to the URL stored in the backend
Icons are visually consistent with the footer design
Links open in new tabs when clicked

requirements.text: Create an admin settings panel with input fields to manage and update social media URLs for Instagram, Facebook, and X

quotes: Admin Interface: Settings panel with fields to manage social media URLs

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard includes a settings section for social media URLs
Form fields allow updating Instagram, Facebook, and X URLs
Changes save to backend and immediately reflect in the footer
Validation ensures URLs are properly formatted

requirements.text: Add clickable Privacy Policy, Shipping Policy, and Terms & Conditions links in the footer that navigate to separate detail pages displaying the respective policy content

quotes: Footer Policy Links: Clickable Privacy Policy, Shipping Policy, and Terms & Conditions opening separate detail pages

acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains three policy links: Privacy Policy, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions
Each link navigates to a dedicated page showing the full policy text
Policy pages display content stored in the backend site content
Pages are accessible to all users without authentication

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths including hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui directory
Preserve existing e-commerce functionality including cart, checkout, and order management
Keep the current Tailwind CSS and React Query stack
nonGoals: Changing the overall site color scheme or branding
Adding real-time social media feed integration
Implementing social media authentication or API connections
